mmgpy.dataset¶

class dataset.Dataset¶

An abstract class representing a Dataset.

All datasets that represent a map from keys to data samples should subclass it. All subclasses should overrite __getitem__(), supporting fetching a data sample for a given key. Subclasses could also optionally overwrite __len__(), which is expected to return the size of the dataset by many Sampler implementations and the default options of DataLoader.

Note

DataLoader by default constructs a index sampler that yields integral indices. To make it work with a map-style dataset with non-integral indices/keys, a custom sampler must be provided.

__weakref__¶

list of weak references to the object (if defined)

class dataset.DataSetFX(output: numpy.ndarray, input: numpy.ndarray, file_name=None, root_dir=None, transform: dataset.transform.TransformBase = None, name=None, matlab_onnx=False)¶

property fx¶

return (dict of numpy arrays): Dictionary of input (X) and output (F) arrays.

property input¶

return (numpy array): [N x dim_x] Array of input values.

property name¶

return (string): Name of DataSet derived from removing filename extension.

property output¶

return (numpy array): [N x dim_f] Array of output values.

property root_dir¶

return (string): Root directory for saving/loading DataSet.
